title: Falador shield 2

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Falador shield 2 is a reward from completing the medium Falador Diary tasks given to you by Sir Rebral in the White Knights' Castle courtyard and can be retrieved from him for free if lost. Its defensive bonuses are equivalent to a Steel kiteshield, except it has the added Prayer bonus.

Falador shield 2

Item ID13118

The Falador shield 2 is a reward from completing the medium Falador Diary tasks given to you by Sir Rebral in the White Knights' Castle courtyard and can be retrieved from him for free if lost. Its defensive bonuses are equivalent to a Steel kiteshield, except it has the added Prayer bonus.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-2
 Defence bonuses
+13+15+14-1+14
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+3List

Contents

  • 1 Benefits
    • 1.1 From Falador shield 1
    • 1.2 Falador shield 2 only
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 References

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Falador shield 1[edit | edit source]

  • Shortcut to the chaos temple from Burthorpe

Falador shield 2 only[edit | edit source]

  • 50% prayer restore once daily
  • 10% more farming experience from Falador farm (Note: the shield does not need to be equipped to gain this experience)
  • Access to a shortcut in the Motherlode Mine
  • Higher chance of receiving a clue scroll from a guard in Falador [1] (Note: the shield does not need to be equipped to get a higher chance)

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 November 2017
(update)

A "Check" option was added to view the number of remaining charges.

24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
20 August 2015
(update)

A colour issue on the Falador shield 2 has been resolved.

28 May 2015
(update)

Falador shield 2 will no longer state you have full prayer points when trying to recharge, unless they are actually full.

30 April 2015
(update)

Attempting to recharge your prayer with a Falador shield when you're already full prayer points no longer consumes one of your daily charges.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The animation that plays when using the shield's prayer restore is identical to that of the elysian spirit shield when its passive effect occurs.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Mod Ronan. "Crystal Halberd Special & More." 23 April 2015. (Archived from the original on 28 August 2021.) Old School RuneScape Forums.

[[File:Falador shield 2 detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''Falador shield 2''' is a reward from completing the [[Falador Diary#Medium|medium Falador Diary]] tasks given to you by [[Sir Rebral]] in the [[White Knights' Castle]] courtyard and can be retrieved from him for free if lost. Its defensive bonuses are equivalent to a [[Steel kiteshield]], except it has the added Prayer bonus.

{{Infobox Bonuses

|aslash = +0

|arange = -2
|dstab = +13
|dslash = +15

}}

==Benefits==
===From Falador shield 1===
*Shortcut to the chaos temple from [[Burthorpe]]

===Falador shield 2 only===
*50% prayer restore once daily
*10% more farming experience from [[Falador farm]] ('''Note:''' the shield does '''not''' need to be equipped to gain this experience)
*Access to a shortcut in the [[Motherlode Mine]]
*Higher chance of receiving a [[clue scroll]] from a [[guard]] in Falador {{CiteForum|url=https://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?380,381,169,65611402|archiveurl=https://archive.is/XgmHi|author=Mod Ronan|title=Crystal Halberd Special & More|postdate=23 April 2015|archivedate=28 August 2021}} ('''Note:''' the shield does '''not''' need to be equipped to get a higher chance)

*The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}

}}

}}

==Trivia==
*The animation that plays when using the shield's prayer restore is identical to that of the [[elysian spirit shield]] when its [[passive effect]] occurs.
